ygData.subject: Re: another topic
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes thats right, it s for us to get on test the game for bugs, words that are spelled wrong and to stress test their servers.  But some ppl don t do this they
ygData.messageBody:
Yes thats right, it's for us to get on test the game for bugs, words that
are spelled wrong and to stress test their servers. But some ppl don't do
this they get on to PLAY only and when things don't go as they see fit they
whine about it and stop testing. It's not about who can get their character
up the highest or to see if you can get the best sword in the game its to
test it. But ppl will die due to a bug or lag and throw a fit over it, they
need to stop and think it's just a beta, we're not suppose to be playing to
just have fun and get things but to play it to test it, a bug gets your
character, it might suck but it's part of the testing.
So instade of whinning about it, just remember its a beta and test it and
report what happened.

**************************
Azor
Lvl 18 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************

----- Original Message -----
From: "Twylork" <twylork@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, September 13, 1999 3:15 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] another topic


> From: "Twylork" <twylork@...>
>
> Replying to your last sentence this is what a beta is for after all.....
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: John Erik Maynus <jmaynus@...>
> To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> Sent: Saturday, September 11, 1999 4:30 PM
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] another topic
>

> game, maybe

> leaving

better
> > and then maybe they'll like the game.
> >
